sentences.cn: …一位与政府意见相左的俄罗斯小说家。

sentences.en: Dissident thought is valuable just because it is dissident.
sentences.cn: 不同的见解的价值就在于它的不同.

sentences.en: He was exiled as a dissident.
sentences.cn: 他被作为持不同政见者流放国外.

sentences.en: That was the dissident movement in Poland.
sentences.cn: 那是波兰的持不同政见者的运动.

sentences.en: The dissident was cast out from his country.
sentences.cn: 这位持不同政见者被驱逐出境.

sentences.en: There were many dissident elements in the population.
sentences.cn: 人民间尚存有许多意见不合的分子.

sentences.en: With the government arrests continuing, dissident groups are becoming weaker everyday , said a 37 - year - old publisher.
sentences.cn: 一位37 岁 的出版商说,官方逮捕行动持续不断, 异议团体的势力也一日不如一日.

trans.tran_cn: 有不同意见的，持不同政见的
trans.tran_en: Dissident people disagree with or criticize their government or a powerful organization they belong to
someone who publicly criticizes the government in a country where this is punished
